actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-1449.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Narcotics Abuse and Control.

summary.text: Authorizes the expenditure of $111,667 by the House Select Committee on Narcotics Abuse and Control for inquiries and investigations from March 1, 1976, through February 28, 1977. Allocates $7,500 to be expended for the procurement of consultant services. Requires the chairman of the Committee to furnish the Committee on House Administration information with respect to any study or investigation intended to be financed from such funds.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Narcotics Abuse and Control.
